synopsis.text:
Newport City, 2027, a year after the devastating Fourth World War, finds itself at the mercy of a sinister virus, Fire-Starter, capable of manipulating people's memories and turning them into puppets for nefarious purposes. As the virus spreads chaos, it leads to the tragic assassination of Japan's Prime Minister, prompting the head of internal security, Daisuke Aramaki, to seek the assistance of the covert organization, Section 9.

Led by the formidable Major Motoko Kusanagi, a full-body cyber prosthesis user and hacker par excellence, Section 9 embarks on a perilous mission to unravel the source of the deadly virus. As they delve deeper into the investigation, they uncover a tangled web of government corruption and a mysterious figure with a hauntingly familiar face.

In a world where advanced cybernetics offers the promise of prolonged life and reduced suffering, it also presents a chilling threat: cyber-terrorism. With humanity interconnected through a system of minds and personalities known as 'ghosts,' the stakes couldn't be higher. As Kusanagi and her team race against time, they find themselves entangled in a conspiracy that could shake the very foundations of their society. Will they be able to unmask the culprit and thwart their nefarious plans in time? Join the thrilling chase in "Ghost in the Shell: The New Movie."
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
